document_data.name: Valwater
document_data.mainbody: '''House Valwater''' was one of the noble families of [[Cormyr]]. It had an estate in the [[Vast Swamp]], along the [[Way of the Manticore]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Head Above Water}} It had a bad reputation due to one of its members trying to poison King [[Foril Obarskyr I]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Gangs of Wheloon}}
document_data.Members:
* Lady [[Mersha Valwater]]
* [[Jerrick Valwater]], Lady Mersha's eldest son. Jerrick served a prison sentence in [[Wheloon]] for the attempted assassination of King Foril. He was the founder of the Lady's Marauders gang who controlled part of the town.
* Lord [[Delshan Valwater]], Lady Mersha's youngest son.
